revised_title: Albert Edward Ingham: A Pioneering Mathematician and Educator
tldr: Albert Edward Ingham was a renowned mathematician and educator who made significant contributions to number theory and the analytic theory of numbers. He authored the classic Cambridge tract, "The Distribution of Prime Numbers," and was known for his exceptional teaching skills and dedication to his students. Ingham's life was marked by his meticulous work ethic, intellectual honesty, and love for mathematics.
